level.text: The Office of the Director of Campaign Finance is established by law under the jurisdiction of the District of Columbia Board of Elections and Ethics.
The Administrator of the Office of Campaign Finance is the “Director of Campaign Finance,” who is appointed by, and serves at the pleasure of, the Board.
The Director of Campaign Finance is responsible for the administrative operations of the Board pertaining to the Campaign Finance Act and other duties delegated or assigned by the Board.
